mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure all interactive elements are easily tappable and avoid small touch targets on mobile devices.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize image sizes and reduce the number of HTTP requests to improve page loading speed.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve page meta descriptions and titles for better search engine visibility.
userExperienceTip: Enhance accessibility features like alt text for images to support users with disabilities.
